content.question: ​The function <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>9</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following expressions also defines <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="2 to the power of open parentheses 3 x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 to the power of open parentheses 2 x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 to the power of open parentheses 3 x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 to the power of open parentheses bevelled x over 2 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mfrac bevelled="true"><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="3 to the power of open parentheses 2 x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
